game.name: DCS: P-51D Debden Eagles Campaign by Reflected Simulations
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Captions available, VR Support, Partial Controller Support, Includes level editor
game.shortDescription: Some of the first American airmen to join the air war over Europe were the volunteers of the RAF’s Eagle Squadrons. In 1942 they were transferred to the Mighty Eighth Air Force under the 4th Fighter Group, based in Debden, Essex.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Some of the first American airmen to join the air war over Europe were the volunteers of the RAF’s Eagle Squadrons. In 1942 they were transferred to the Mighty Eighth Air Force under the 4th Fighter Group, based in Debden, Essex.
